com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.base

Interface DynamicSurfaceWidget

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicCardView, DynamicMaterialCardView, DynamicPopupBackground, DynamicSpinner

    public interface DynamicSurfaceWidget
    Interface to create dynamic widgets with surface options which can be used to adjust their elevation, background, etc. according to the DynamicTheme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isElevationOnSameBackground()
      Returns whether to enable elevation on the same background.
      void setElevationOnSameBackground(boolean elevationOnSameBackground)
      Set the elevation ons ame background option for this widget.
      void setSurface()
      Set surface for this widget according to the supplied values.

    • Method Detail

      • isElevationOnSameBackground

        boolean isElevationOnSameBackground()
        Returns whether to enable elevation on the same background.
        Returns:
        true to enable elevation on the same background.

      • setElevationOnSameBackground

        void setElevationOnSameBackground(boolean elevationOnSameBackground)
        Set the elevation ons ame background option for this widget.
        Parameters:
        elevationOnSameBackground - true to enable elevation on the same background.

      • setSurface

        void setSurface()
        Set surface for this widget according to the supplied values.
